text:
The district administration has identified a site, spread over 78 acres, to construct the proposed Jawaharlal Institute of Post-graduate Medical Education and Research (JIPMER) branch college here, Collector E. Vallavan told a team of experts and officials from the Union Ministry of Health and Family Welfare besides the specialists from JIPMER. Led by Satish Kumar, Under Secretary, Union Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, the team inspected the site and the plan.

The Collector informed the team that all preliminary steps have been taken for handing over the site to the JIPMER. Shanmugasundaram, Superintending Engineer, and Rajasekaran, Executive Engineer, accompanied the team.
title: Site for JIPMER branch college identified
